law.text: "Charter" means articles of incorporation, articles of agreement, articles of association, charter granted by legislative act, or other basic constituent document of a corporation, or the power of attorney of the attorney-in-fact of a reciprocal insurer, or underwriter's agreement and power of attorney of a Lloyd's plan insurer.
law.history: Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 3, sec. 5, effective June 18, 1970.
